Text:
function EP_BAD_11()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

  SAVE()

  -- //ウランルートEP5の姫選挙に失敗した際に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SET_EFFECT_FIRE_01_L(20, 2000)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

  -- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
  PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

  -- //炎のエフェクト
  -- //ウランルート最終盤の火事のシーンと同一

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Three!" ]])

  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "…………" ]])
  -- //ボイス無し

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Three!" ]])

  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "…………" ]])
  -- //ボイス無し

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano157.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "A-Akira...? Why aren’t you doing the countdown?" ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask031",500,false)

  PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")
  -- //BU：ミナト（焦り）、アキラ・メヒＴ（真剣）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,30,0,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano158.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Serious
 "Is this really the time for such a farceーーーーーーーーー! It's so hot I feel like I'm dying, hurry and rescue Uragon so we can escape―――――!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano159.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Flustered
 "T-That’s true, it’s definitely hot. Why does this place, which should be a different dimension, feel like a fire broke out?" ]])

  MSG([[
  【Chikuwa Daimyojin】
 "Let me explain! The otherworld where BokuHime takes place is spawned with the main story’s Minato-kun as the center, so it’s influenced by the environment around him!" ]])

  MSG([[
  【Chikuwa Daimyojin】
 "Also, the characters that appear are only summoned in consciousness from the main story; their memories don’t carry over! So you could say it’s a space with little purpose!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano160.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Smile
 "I see. I was wondering how it connected to the main story, but it’s a convenient setup like that." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano161.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Normal
 "Who was that just now?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01fa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano162.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Forced Smile・Sweat
 "W-Well anyway! I’ll quickly get hints from Akira and go back to rescue Uran-san!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano163.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Normal
 "What do I need to rescue Uran-san from that fire scene?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano164.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Smirk
 "Love, you see." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano165.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Flustered
 "Why love, of all things!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano166.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Smile
 "If you explode the power of love you’ve built up by overdoing your siscon, then the intense heat won’t matter. Anyway, please find Uragon with spirit!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano167.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】Serious
 "Y-Yeah... got it. I’ll use my feelings for Uran-san as a weapon and get through this crisis!" ]])

  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_LOAD(80, "CI078a")
  LAYER_EFFECT(80,4)
  LAYER_POSITION(80,-400,0)
  LAYER_ALPHA(80,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,255,300,Ease.OutSine)
  WAIT(300)
  PLAY_SE("SEz008.wav")
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(80,0,100,300,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,300,Ease.OutSine)
  WAIT(300)
  LAYER_LOAD(50, "")
  LAYER_LOAD(80, "")

  -- //BU：アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano168.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Normal
 "Because the center point Minachin disappeared, the space has begun to collapse. So the earlier explanation by that person was correct." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano169.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Serious
 "But... who could that be? Might they be a god-like entity controlling this otherworld...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano170.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Chikuwa Daimyojin】
 "Kukukku..." ]])
  -- //ボイス無し

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano171.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】Mehi T・Flustered
 "Y-You are――!?" ]])

  -- //BU：アキラ・メヒＴ（笑顔）、アキラ・雑
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI05aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano172.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Relaxed Akira】Casual
 "It's me... the other ‘me’." ]])
  -- //ボイス無し

  STOP_BGM(1000)
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  RESET_EFFECT_FIRE_01(20)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  MSG([[ ――To be continued. ]])

  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)
  -- //ウランルート第５章［結-2］冒頭から再開

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_11 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
